    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Goal</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">Create a decision</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Preconditions</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">The user is a member of the project for which he wants to create a new decision.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Basic flow</b></td>
      <td colspan="4"> 
      
<OL>
<LI>The user chooses _create decision_</LI>
<LI>The system displays a wizard with the following steps and fields:
<ol>
<li> Essential information
<ul>
<LI>Name text field _(required, must be unique in the project, minimum number of characters: 3)_</LI>
<LI>Menu to select a template _(required)_. Previously entered data in the second step should not get lost when changing the template. Also provide a help notification that states that the information will not be lost when changing the template.</LI>
<LI>Date field with date picker _(required)_ which can be used to specify a date on which the decision was made. The default value should be the current date.</LI>
<li>Menu to select concerns, which are drivers for this decision</li>
</ul>
</li>

<li> Template related information
<ul>
<li>Several text areas, which depend on the selected template are shown. Also, information can be retrieved from the Open Pattern repository by searching for keywords and then selecting a pattern or technology. Upon selection, the textual description should be displayed to the user.</li>
</ul>
</li>

<li> State
<ul>
<li>This step should provide functionality to set the current state and the members, which are responsible for the state transition (hereinafter initiators). A state change will result in a new version of the decision. Show a small notification that explains what happens when changing the state, i.e. explain that a new version will be created and that the user should consider changing the initiators.</li>
</ul>
</li>

<li> Relationships
<ul>
<li>Menu to add, modify and remove relationships for a decision.</li>
</ul>
</li>



<li> Overview
<ul>
<li>A confirmation page that shows all previously entered data</li>
</ul>
</li>

</ol></li>

<LI>The user confirmes his entries with _submit_</LI>
<LI>The system saves this new decision and the current date</LI>
</OL>
      
      </td>
    </tr>
